extendedInfo.description: This calendar software works completely without google servers keeping your private stuff from the eyes of all-seeing google. It is a fork of AnCal and is also released under MIT license.It fully supports portrait and landscape orientation.

reviews.comment: Finally, a nice, simple to use, straight forward calendar I like it, works seamlessly with HTC desire. What\'s next? an address book.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Does not show all weeks of a month on my xperia mini pro even in landscape - shame because otherwise nice looking app
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like it so far. The only problem is its too small and you can\'t zoom in and out to make it bigger and easier to use. HTC Desire
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Can\'t zoom in - font too small
reviews.comment: Everything on the display is way too small on a Galaxy SII - shame as it looks good otherwise.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I like this calender, very good app! Thank you :) Would like to scroll though on X10 mini pro, doesnt fit on screen. Keep up the good work
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Not usable on 320x240. Can\'t scroll to see whole month for setting appt. Wont rotate 90 if keyboard slid closed and that\'s the only way to see \'set\'.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: nice
reviews.comment: would even donate if it would be full screen n be able to set alarm earlier
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A calendar that doesn\'t sync! This is exactly what I needed!!! Would like to be able to enter end times, and bi -monthly appts too. Thanks!!!
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: A secure calendar! Shame the interface needs work...
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Does what description says
reviews.comment: It\'s an app which I was looking for for  ages! Can find needs of improvement, but as a stand alone without data leaking calendar, so simple and small size is just BRILLIANT! Low ratings mostly left users who ain\'t able to read description. Can\'t believe this is for free :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I love this app except it seems not to have support to change the alarm ringtone in mytouch slide
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Disappointing. Needed offline calendar, but this doesn\'t display well in landscape, setting time is very tedious. \"j2cal\" looks similar, works better.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: I would like this app better if it let you have a finish time for your appointments.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works great on droidx. Nice features.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Nice offline, but
reviews.comment: Simple enough to use, but I need to be able to fill in some events after the fact and I get the message I must correct a date in the past.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Finally found a calendar that is offline
reviews.comment: just what i was looking for. simple,to the point and offline. :)
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Works good but small
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: It\'s nice but lacks of a centrral feature: .ics support. It\'s useless to me.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.comment: Finally, a simple-to-use calendar / scheduler that doesn\'t actively spew your busuness onto the Web.  Good job. Thanks.
reviews.author: A Google User

reviews.title: Too small.
reviews.comment: No way that I have found to change font size
reviews.author: David S
